doc.field: Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 23
Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 23
COMMERCIAL: Thirteenth Annual Center Garden Party
1. Lesbian and Gay News: Andy Humm and Ann Northrop discuss recent general events that relate to the LGBT community.
COMMERCIAL: Homo Xtra, "The one. The only. The original."
2. Interview: [Susan Buttenweiser], of Equality in Marriage New York, discusses the issue of same-sex marriage.
COMMERCIAL: Ad Council, National Alliance for Research on Schizophrenia and Depression
4. Interview: Letitia Guillory, Artistic Director for the AIDS Theatre Project, discusses an upcoming event at the Roundabout Theatre.
COMMERCIAL: Ad Council, Earth Share, "It's a connected world."
COMMERCIAL: Ad Council, "You Could Learn a Lot From a Dummy. Use Child Safety Seats."
6. Footage from the AVP (Anti-Violence Project) Roast of Matt Foreman, former Executive Director, and footage of Anti-Violence Project Rally featuring Peggy Rivera.
COMMERCIAL: Thirteenth Annual Center Garden Party
COMMERCIAL: Homo Xtra, "The one. The only. The original."
7. Footage of POZ Life Expo at the Javits Center.

8. "Lambda Update": Kevin Cathcart, Executive Director of the Lambda Legal Defense and Education Fund, introduces Lou Maletta's interview with Catherine Hanssens, Lambda AIDS Project Director, regarding the recent repeal of the [Dornan Amendment].
9. Footage of Pride Month Celebration at the NYC Board of Education. Includes footage of Ruth Messinger, [Manhattan Borough President].
10. Lou Maletta urges viewers to pledge money to Gay Cable Network.
Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 23: 1996
